nowPage.title: What I'm Up To
nowPage.description: A Now page is a simple concept created by <derekSivers>Derek Sivers</derekSivers> that offers a fun and engaging way to share what I'm up to right now.

life.title: Life
life.content: Working on three projects at the moment, writing code. One for Ukrainians in Switzerland, one related to JiuJitsu industry in Switzerland, and the third one is this blog
